content.question: The use of imported materials such as tiny colored glass beads and silk ribbons on Bandolier bags were intended to show the

choices.label: desire for the bags’ materials to reflect light during ceremonial dances
extinction of the animals that had provided traditional materials
political power of the wearer, who received the materials as tributes
function of the bags as indications of the wearers’ social status

content.answer: function of the bags as indications of the wearers’ social status

topic.text: 5.3: Purpose and Audience in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
